content: HSL4-SK Heavy-duty wedge anchor Ultimate-performance heavy-duty wedge anchor with approvals for flush-mount fastenings in concrete (carbon steel, countersunk) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Aesthetic appearance and no tripping hazard due to flush installation High tensile and shear load capacity, force-controlled expansion allows follow-up expansion ETA Option 1 for cracked and uncracked concrete ICC-ES/AC 193 for cracked and uncracked concrete and seismic Suitable for dynamic loading including fatigue, seismic and shock Applications Fastenings in safety-relevant and/or dynamic applications where a flush installation or aesthetic appearance is required, including applications in nuclear power plants Applications where extensive approval back-up or technical back-up is required Examples are medical equipment, hand rails, machines, car hoists, safety fences, pumps, etc. Applications requiring an aesthetic countersunk head finish ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Zinc plated (min. 5 microns) Head configuration: Countersunk Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Zinc plated (min. 5 microns) | Head configuration | Countersunk | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2237397 - Anchor HSL4-SK M8 d12x80 10/-/- - Package Size 40 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSL-4-SK M8/10 Heavy-duty anchor assy - 2237398 - Anchor HSL4-SK M8 d12x90 20/-/- - Package Size 40 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSL-4-SK M8/20 Heavy-duty anchor assy - 2237395 - Anchor HSL4-SK M10 d15x100 20/-/- - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSL-4-SK M10 Heavy-duty anchor assy - 2237396 - Anchor HSL4-SK M12 d18x120 25/-/- - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSL-4-SK M12 Heavy-duty anchor assy
